subject: Citibank
body:
Citibank
Bank Address: 61 Forsyth St SW Suite 8B-45 Atlanta, GA 30303, USA.
Tel: +1(646) 838-0882
                                                        US$12.5Million ATM MasterCard Payment
 
Attn: Fund Beneficiary,
 
I am Mr. Andrew Leonard, the new Director ATM Head of Operation Dept, Citibank, Georgia USA. I resumed to this office on the 16th of last month and during my official research last week I discovered an abandoned ATM MasterCard valued US$12.5Million with card number (5384 9464 4618 4540) belonging to you as the legitimate beneficiary, and from all indication it has been confirmed that this fund is as a result of your inheritance payment from West Africa.
 
I had to carry out an investigation to know the reason why this card has not been released to you up till now and I found out that the formal director ATM head of operation who left this office two months ago with-held your card for his own personal use but unluckily for him I do not support injustice, and as the new Director ATM Head of Operation, I assure you that I will release your ATM MasterCard to you.
Now that your ATM MasterCard is still available and your fund of US$12.5Million still intact, I want to know how you wish to receive your card along with your 4 digits pin code. You can come down here to our bank to pick up your card directly from my office or alternatively, you can use the service of a registered courier delivery company to deliver your card to you and you will take care of the courier fee.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Thanks for your cooperation and understanding. We will serve you better.
 
Yours Faithfully,
Mr. Andrew Leonard
Director ATM Head of Operation Dept,
Citibank
Bank Address: 61 Forsyth St SW Suite 8B-45 Atlanta, GA 30303, USA.
Tel: +1(646) 838-0882

subject: Re:   Citibank
body:
Hello Mr. Andrew Leonard,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the abandoned ATM card. I appreciate your efforts in investigating the matter and ensuring that my funds are safe. 

I would like to know more about the options available for receiving my card. Could you please provide me with some details about the registered courier delivery service? How reliable is it, and what would be the estimated cost for the delivery?

Additionally, I would like to inquire about the security measures in place to protect my personal information during this process. As you can understand, I want to ensure that my financial details are kept confidential.

Thank you once again for your assistance, and I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ronnie

subject: Re:   Citibank
body:
Citibank
Bank Address: 176 Water St New York, NY 10268, USA.
Tel: +1(646) 838-0882

                                                             US$12.5Million ATM MasterCard Payment

Attn: Fund Beneficiary,

I received your email and the content is well noted. Your ATM Card will be delivered to you through UPS Courier Delivery Service and the delivery cost if US$270

The delivery will arrive to you within 48 hours from the time the delivery commences. Concerning your ATM Card PIN Code, we will SMS it to your direct telephone number, (Therefore send me your direct telephone number)

Pay the US$270 courier fee to the below account details through bank wire transfer:

Bank Name: Citibank
Account Name: Joseph Broughton
Acct Number.  149870538
Routing Number: 271070801
Swift Code: CITIUS33XXX
Bank Address: 176 Water St New York, NY 10268, USA.
Holder's Address: 187 Archer Road Mahopac New York 10541 USA.

As soon as you make the payment, forward me the payment transfer slip and upon the confirmation of the payment I will ship out your ATM card to you and send you the shipment tracking number.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Thanks for your cooperation and understanding. We will serve you better.

Yours Faithfully,

Mr. Andrew Leonard
Director ATM Head of Operation Dept,
Citibank
Bank Address: 176 Water St New York, NY 10268, USA.
Tel: +1(646) 838-0882

subject: Re:   Citibank
body:
Hello Mr. Andrew Leonard,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with the information regarding the delivery of my ATM card. I appreciate your assistance in this matter.

I understand that the delivery will be made through UPS Courier Delivery Service. Could you please clarify the exact amount of the delivery cost? I want to make sure I have the correct funds available.

Regarding the PIN code for my ATM card, I would prefer to receive it via email rather than SMS. Is that possible?

Also, could you please provide me with more details about the bank wire transfer? Which bank should I use for the transfer, and are there any specific instructions or reference numbers I need to include?

Once I have made the payment, how long will it take for my ATM card to be shipped out and delivered to me? Will there be a tracking number provided so that I can monitor its progress?

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ronnie

subject: Re:   Citibank
body:
